entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
